MonsterTrait.Name: Dwarven Resilience
MonsterTrait.Text: Augrek has advantage on saving throws against poison.

MonsterTrait.Name: Roleplaying Information
MonsterTrait.Text:
Sheriff's Ddeputy Augrek guards the southwest gate of BRyn Shander and welcomes visitors to town. She has a good heart.
Ideal: "You'll get farther in life with a kind word than an axe" Bond: "Bryn Shander is my home. It's my job to protect her." Flaw: "I'm head over heels in love with Sheriff Southwell. One day I hope to marry him."

MonsterAction.Name: Warhammer
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d10+2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

MonsterAction.Name: Heavy Crossbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage. Augrek carries ten crossbow bolts.
